items: Use for incidental pulmonary nodules in patients >=35 years old.
Do not use for lung cancer screening, known primary cancer, or immunosuppression.
Use the most suspicious nodule to guide management.

This calculator is for educational purposes and should not replace clinical judgment. Always apply patient-specific factors and current guidelines when determining management.
